name: Umbra Luna Collage Picture Frame Holds Nine 4x6" Photos, Large 22-Inch Diameter, White
short_description: GALLERY STYLE 4 x 6 PICTURE FRAME: Luna is a multi picture frame and photo collage frame that makes it easy for you to instantly create a custom photo collage showcasing 9 individual 4 x 6 inch photos

DISPLAY PHOTOS, ARTWORK, ILLUSTRATIONS & MORE: Use Luna to showcase 9 of your favorite 4x6 photos in a single picture frame or get creative and combine pictures, graphic text, illustrations, drawings, sketches, and other unique art for a one-of-a-kind, DIY collage photo frame

WALL ART & PHOTO DISPLAY: Luna doubles as a photo display and wall art with a simple elegant plastic frame design that makes it easy to swap photos and clean your Luna while the pre-mounted sawtooth hangers make it a breeze to hang

QUICK & EASY TO SET UP: To ensure your Luna picture frame collage is perfectly aligned, simply place your photos, artwork, illustrations etc. on top of the included face paper (use as a guide) then secure in place using a small piece of clear tape

ORIGINAL DESIGN & TOTAL SATISFACTION: Our team of international designers brings thought, creativity and original design to everyday items. Umbra products are made to last using high quality materials. Don’t be fooled by copy-cat products. Choose Umbra and get the original. If you’re not completely satisfied for any reason, contact us within 30 days and we will fix it.
product_description: Smartphones have made it easy to capture precious memories wherever you go and social media has made sharing those moments effortless. Unfortunately, with so many photos being taken and shared each day, it’s all too easy for those really special photos to get forgotten, when they should be printed and displayed. Introducing Luna by Umbra Luna holds nine of your favorite 4x6 inch photos in a modern, gallery-style fashion and will effortlessly enhance your wall decor. At the same time, its’ practical design features a solid backing which allows you to clean and change your images easily. To place your photos, use the existing face paper as a guide. Simply secure your own photos on top of the face paper using clear tape and you’re ready to go. Plus, Luna has an impactful 21.75-inch diameter design and comes with two sawtooth hangers pre-mounted to the frame; so, hanging it is also a breeze. Use Luna as family wall decor or to commemorate your favorite moments in an unforgettable way while adding a nice decorative touch to your home, office, community space, or dorm room with Luna. About Umbra: A global product design company providing original, modern, casual, and functional design for the home.

It's the ideal way to showcase your cherished photos anywhere in your home or office. Display three 4x6 photos with the included mat or remove the mat for a 8x16 display. The metal tab closures make swapping photos a breeze, so you can update your walls as often as you like.
